description:
This course provides step-by-step instructions on how to setup and optimize your AdWords account to deliver maximum paid search performance. You will learn how AdWords works, what to do (and what not to do) when creating your AdWords account, and how to optimize AdWords to improve performance. By the end of the course, you will have solid foundational skills in AdWords and a solid understanding of search engine marketing (SEM).

The lectures are a mix of slides and screencasts with audio. In the screencasts, we will examine the performance of a real AdWords account.

This course will take approximately 90 minutes to complete.

Please note that this course is currently FREE and a work-in-progress. I appreciate any feedback provided in the discussion group that will help improve the quality of the course!
title: AdWords 101: The Beginner's Guide to AdWords
